attributes.action: Making dog on dog attacks illegal
attributes.background: I have seen many posts through friends and social media which show the damage a dog can do.  Whether it be to a person or another dog, I believe a dog that will attack should be assessed immediately and relevant action taken.  It should not be ignored just because it's 'only happened to a dog'.

rejection.details:
It's not clear how you would like the law to be changed. If you would like the law to be changed to create a new criminal offence, which would apply to the owner or keeper of a dog if it attacks another dog, you could start a petition about that.

You can read about some of the existing offences here:

http://www.cps.gov.uk/legal/d_to_g/offences_involving_domestic_and_captive_animals/
